definition: to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request

sentences.english: Look for more to come and enjoy today's feature.
sentences.chinese: 敬请期待后续报道，享受今天的内容。

sentences.english: Please forward to everyone you know.
sentences.chinese: 敬请告知你认识的每个人。

sentences.english: Stay tuned for more reviews once I start to give it a work out.
sentences.chinese: 敬请期待更多的评论当我开始给它一个工作了。

sentences.english: We will update you our January 2010 speed dating event soon.
sentences.chinese: 我们即将公布2010年1月份速配活动，敬请留意。

sentences.english: Most interesting photos are uploaded for your pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 我们把最美最有趣的照片传上来，敬请欣赏。

sentences.english: Kindly favwe us dawn the lowest cash price to the bads.
sentences.chinese: 敬请告知该货以现金支付的很低价格。

sentences.english: Please read the operation instructions of hoisting machine.
sentences.chinese: 敬请用户认真阅读卷扬机使用说明书。

sentences.english: CNET News will be covering the launch, so stay tuned for updates.
sentences.chinese: CNET科技资讯网将覆盖推出，敬请更新调整。

sentences.english: Please accept the gifts that we give to the nannies and children.
sentences.chinese: 敬请您们收下这些给保育员们和孩子们的礼物。

sentences.english: Results of the competition will be posted in late October.
sentences.chinese: 比赛成绩将于十月底公布，敬请期待。

sentences.english: Welcomes the user to plant talks, concrete matters if stopped.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎广大用户来厂洽谈，具体事宜敬请垂询。

sentences.english: Thank you in advance for your concern and attention. Please let me hear from you as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 预先感谢阁下对我的关怀，并敬请尽速赐函示知。

sentences.english: Please visit Everforex. com at a later time. We apologize for the inconvenience.
sentences.chinese: 请稍后再访问汇联金网通，不便之处，敬请谅解。

sentences.english: Oversea edition will be published in North America and Europe, please stay tuned.
sentences.chinese: 海外版即将在北美及欧洲发行，敬请各位读者关注。

sentences.english: Please visit the web site for more information about the series and for past and future videos.
sentences.chinese: 敬请访问该网站以获得相关系列以及视频的更多信息。

sentences.english: Here's my book. I respectfully request that you point out the mistakes.

definition: to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
to forward (a shipment)/to reprint sth published elsewhere/Taiwan pr. [zhuan3 zai4]
to infringe the rights of/to violate/infringement
you (courteous, as opposed to informal 你[ni3])
source (esp. of quotation or literary allusion)/origin/where sth comes from
to point out mistakes or weak points for correction/to comment/criticism
this text/article/the main body of a book
